00034 class SIM_API cStdDev : public cStatistic
00035 {
00036   protected:
00037     long num_vals;
00038     double min_vals, max_vals;
00039     double sum_vals, sqrsum_vals;
00040 
00041   protected:
00042     void doMerge(const cStatistic *other);
00043 
00044   public:
00047 
00051     cStdDev(const cStdDev& r) : cStatistic() {setName(r.getName());operator=(r);}
00052 
00056     explicit cStdDev(const char *name=NULL);
00057 
00061     virtual ~cStdDev() {}
00062 
00066     cStdDev& operator=(const cStdDev& res);
00068 
00071 
00076     virtual cStdDev *dup() const  {return new cStdDev(*this);}
00077 
00082     virtual std::string info() const;
00083 
00088     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00089 
00095     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00096 
00102     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00104 
00107 
00111     virtual void collect(double value);
00112 
00116     virtual void collect(SimTime value) {collect(value.dbl());}
00117 
00124     virtual void merge(const cStatistic *other);
00125 
00129     virtual bool isWeighted() const  {return false;}
00130 
00134     virtual long getCount() const  {return num_vals;}
00135 
00139     virtual double getSum() const  {return sum_vals;}
00140 
00144     virtual double getSqrSum() const  {return sqrsum_vals;}
00145 
00149     virtual double getMin() const  {return min_vals;}
00150 
00154     virtual double getMax() const  {return max_vals;}
00155 
00160     virtual double getMean() const  {return num_vals==0 ? 0 : sum_vals/num_vals;}
00161 
00165     virtual double getStddev() const;
00166 
00170     virtual double getVariance() const;
00171 
00175     virtual double getWeights() const  {return getCount();}
00176 
00181     virtual double getWeightedSum() const  {return getSum();}
00182 
00187     virtual double getSqrSumWeights() const  {return getCount();}
00188 
00193     virtual double getWeightedSqrSum() const  {return getSqrSum();}
00194 
00199     virtual double random() const;
00200 
00204     virtual void clearResult();
00205 
00209     virtual void saveToFile(FILE *) const;
00210 
00215     virtual void loadFromFile(FILE *);
00217 };

00227 class SIM_API cWeightedStdDev : public cStdDev
00228 {
00229   protected:
00230     double sum_weights;
00231     double sum_weighted_vals;
00232     double sum_squared_weights;
00233     double sum_weights_squared_vals;
00234 
00235   public:
00238 
00242     cWeightedStdDev(const cWeightedStdDev& r) : cStdDev() {setName(r.getName());operator=(r);}
00243 
00247     explicit cWeightedStdDev(const char *name=NULL) : cStdDev(name)  {sum_weights=sum_weighted_vals=sum_squared_weights=sum_weights_squared_vals=0.0;}
00248 
00252     virtual ~cWeightedStdDev() {}
00253 
00257     cWeightedStdDev& operator=(const cWeightedStdDev& res);
00259 
00262 
00267     virtual cWeightedStdDev *dup() const  {return new cWeightedStdDev(*this);}
00268 
00273     virtual std::string info() const;
00274 
00280     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00281 
00287     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00289 
00292 
00296     virtual void collect(double value)  {collect2(value,1.0);}
00297 
00301     virtual void collect(SimTime value) {collect(value.dbl());}
00302 
00306     virtual bool isWeighted() const  {return true;}
00307 
00311     virtual void collect2(double value, double weight);
00312 
00316     virtual void collect2(SimTime value, double weight) {collect2(value.dbl(), weight);}
00317 
00321     virtual void collect2(double value, SimTime weight) {collect2(value, weight.dbl());}
00322 
00326     virtual void collect2(SimTime value, SimTime weight) {collect2(value.dbl(), weight.dbl());}
00327 
00333     virtual void merge(const cStatistic *other);
00334 
00338     virtual void clearResult();
00339 
00344     virtual double getMean() const  {return sum_weights==0 ? 0 : sum_weighted_vals / sum_weights;}
00345 
00349     virtual double getVariance() const;
00350 
00354     virtual double getWeights() const  {return sum_weights;}
00355 
00359     virtual double getWeightedSum() const  {return sum_weighted_vals;}
00360 
00364     virtual double getSqrSumWeights() const  {return sum_squared_weights;}
00365 
00369     virtual double getWeightedSqrSum() const  {return sum_weights_squared_vals;}
00370 
00374     virtual void saveToFile(FILE *) const;
00375 
00379     virtual void loadFromFile(FILE *);
00381 };
